## takeScreenshot() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function takeScreenshot(config: Config, page: Page, fileName: string, selector?: string): Promise<Buffer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | Config |  |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  fileName | string | Where to write the screenshot to |
|  selector | string | if specified only the element matching the selector will be screenshotted |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Buffer&gt;
